snippet: Estimates are that NBC has spent as much as $25 million promoting “Smash,” a new series that the network hopes will be the hit it desperately needs.
abstract: NBC is estimated to have spent as much as $25 million promoting Smash, a new series that the network hopes will be the hit it desperately needs; while NBC would welcome much-better-than average ratings, the network has made efforts to tamp down expectations.
lead_paragraph: Estimates are that NBC has spent as much as $25 million promoting “Smash,” a new series that the network hopes will be the hit it desperately needs.

headline.seo: NBC Spends Millions on the Buildup to ‘Smash’
headline.main: NBC Spends Millions on the Buildup to ‘Smash’
headline.print_headline: Starved for a Hit, NBC Spends Millions on the Buildup to ‘Smash’
